attributes.action: remove the stepped approach to 10 Downing Street to create equal access for disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To carry out a feasibility study with a view to removing the stepped changes in level leading to the main entrance at 10 Downing Street.  This to allow visitors an equal access experience, to remove the symbolic barrier to Government and give out a clear message that the Prime Minister believes that disabled people have a place in polictics.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the stepped approach to 10 Downing Street to create equal access for disabled people."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
